nodes.text: The Ingo system was a Mid Rim system of the Bortele Cluster in the Bortele sector.

The star system had sixteen unremarkable planets orbiting the star that gave the system and its main known planet its name: Ingo. The planet Ingo, in the second orbit in the system, was orbited by five moons: Meragon, Gravaj, Por Raton, Terig, and Drarn. Only the latter two moons had accommodated massive mining operations after they had being purchased by the House of Tagge Mining Company.

This labeled unremarkable backwater system become a little better known after the acclaimed victory of two of its inhabitants, Thall Joben and Jord Dusat at the Boonta Speeder Race during the celebrations of the Boonta's Eve of 15 BBY.
